Metadata.title: Paweł Nowecki - Fullstack Developer
Metadata.description: Portfolio of a Senior Fullstack Developer. Websites, e-commerce, mobile apps, custom systems, AI implementations.

Hero.description: I design and implement complex digital systems, e-commerce platforms, and process automations. I execute projects holistically – from architecture and business logic to the visual layer and deployment.

About.subtitle: About Me
About.title: Developer with a passion for <highlight>innovation</highlight>
About.description: I am a passionate developer who bridges the world of code with business goals. I don't just write code; I implement solutions that genuinely improve company operations. I specialize in creating websites and online stores, dedicated systems, as well as AI and process automation that save time and increase company efficiency.

achievements: Developing dedicated systems and AI solutions for clients
Learnnapp application: maintenance, fixing production bugs, and React Native version upgrade
Orca application: code audit, preparation for React Native upgrade, and implementation of new architecture
Development of new functionalities in mobile apps: Moje Suzuki, cHow, and Mój Sklep (Eurocash)
Designing and implementing key solutions that improve daily business processes and enhanced user experience quality.
Developing new functionalities for a web application handling online and hybrid events, and creating key modules for the event management system
Designing and implementing a new, responsive website for the platform, focusing on performance optimization and code quality
Programming a mobile app for ticket scanning integrated with the web platform, ensuring stable and fast communication between systems
Developing and implementing a comprehensive training system for House of Skills, streamlining training organization and execution
Designing and implementing a branch service mobile app for BNP Paribas Bank, streamlining operations, communication, and customer service
Managing and executing a web application project for Essilor, ensuring timeliness and quality
Co-creating and implementing digital campaigns for Orange (Love campaign) and preparing the IQOS brand launch for the Polish market for Philip Morris International
Preparing, executing, and implementing digital campaigns for clients such as Eurocash, Adidas, Coty, Opel, Philips, Maspex, Geberit, and Reprise Digital

irrify.title: Irrify.ai
irrify.description: Advanced platform for business process automation using artificial intelligence. The system enables the creation of intelligent AI agents, workflow automation, and integration with popular tools.

chow.title: cHow
chow.description: The cHow system is used to quickly and conveniently collect and analyze information from field employees about your own sales network, competitive networks, and the environment.

suzuki.title: Moje Suzuki
suzuki.description: Development of new functionalities in the My Suzuki application, allowing convenient service history review, receiving notifications about inspections, and service/recall actions.

restaurant.title: Restauracja nad zalewem
restaurant.description: Wordpress used as a headless CMS utilizing Advanced Custom Fields and GraphQL connected to a frontend created using NextJS. Thanks to this technology combination, the website achieved the maximum possible score in Google tests.

Offer.subtitle: Offer
Offer.title: How can I <highlight>help</highlight> you?
Offer.description: I offer comprehensive programming services - from simple websites to advanced AI systems and business automations.

websites.title: Websites & Stores
websites.description: Modern websites, e-commerce stores, landing pages that convert into customers.

mobile.title: Mobile Apps
mobile.description: iOS and Android mobile apps, admin panels, custom business applications.

systems.title: Dedicated Systems
systems.description: Custom CRM/ERP systems, admin panels, tailored business applications.

ai.title: AI Implementations
ai.description: Intelligent AI agents, process automation, integration with OpenAI and other LLM models.

automation.title: Automations
automation.description: Workflow automation, API integrations, bots and scripts saving hundreds of hours of work.

Contact.subtitle: Contact
Contact.title: Let's talk about <highlight>your project</highlight>
Contact.infoDescription: Have questions? Want to discuss your project? Write to me - I usually reply within 24 hours.
